meanings.definition: To rule or govern as a king or queen.
meanings.sent1: The wise king rajes over his kingdom with fairness.
meanings.sent2: She rajes over the land with authority and grace.
meanings.sent3: The cat thinks it can rajes over the house, demanding treats.
meanings.sent4: The sun rajes over the sky, casting its warm light on all below.
meanings.sent5: The storm rajes through the forest, bending trees to its will.

meanings.definition: A person who rules or governs as a king or queen.
meanings.sent1: The rajes of the kingdom was loved by all.
meanings.sent2: The wise rajes listened to the concerns of the people.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended to be a rajes of her toy kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The lion in the jungle was considered the rajes of all beasts.
meanings.sent5: The ancient tales spoke of a powerful rajes who united the lands.

meanings.definition: A period of rule or reign by a king or queen.
meanings.sent1: During the rajes of the queen, the kingdom prospered.
meanings.sent2: The rajes of the king brought peace to the land.
meanings.sent3: The rajes of winter seemed to never end, covering everything in snow.
meanings.sent4: The rajes of the sun marked the beginning of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The rajes of the moon shone brightly in the night sky.
